ref.mixed-citation: Dragsted U, Fox Z, Mathiesen L et al (2004) Final week 48 analysis of a phase 4, randomised, open-label, multi-center trial to evaluate safety and efficacy of continued lamivudine twice daily versus discontinuation of lamivudine in HIV-1-infected adults with virological failure on ongoing combination treatments containing lamivudine: the COLATE trial [Abstract 549]. In: 11th conference on retroviruses and opportunistic infections, San Francisco
